config_used.description: Configuration for Thematic-LM coding stage (SAE feature explanations). Following paper: Qiao et al. WWW '25

run_config.description: Run-specific settings. Edit these before each run.

llm_config.description: Following paper Section 4: GPT model with temperature=1.0, top_p=1.0, JSON mode

coder_config.description: SAE-specific coder with domain guidance for pattern identification

codebook_config.description: Following Thematic-LM paper: reviewer decides ALL merge/new decisions. Top-k=10 similar codes retrieved (Section 4).

processing_config.description: Per-item processing, up to 100 quotes per code (paper: 20), 1-3 codes per explanation
